steps_header_title: Discover My Journey at Gebze Technical University
steps_header_description: During my undergraduate studies at Gebze Technical University, I focused on computer engineering, completing assignments and projects in algorithm design, operating systems, and real-time systems. These experiences strengthened my practical skills in developing efficient algorithms, system-level programming, and managing resources. In my master’s program in Artificial Intelligence, I worked on machine learning models and natural language processing projects, applying advanced AI techniques to real-world problems. My GitHub repositories reflect these experiences, highlighting the diverse projects and skills I've developed.
step1_description: A project designed to streamline library operations by automating book tracking, member management, and borrowing processes. This system enhances efficiency and user experience for libraries of all sizes.
step2_description: This project covers a chatbot system developed using Python's RASA library. A user-friendly interface was designed with React and a database was established with SQLite. The project combines modern software technologies to provide an effective solution that optimizes user interactions and data management.
step3_description: A cutting-edge search engine built using language models to deliver precise and relevant search results. This project highlights the integration of AI in improving search technologies.
step4_description: This project is a sample application developed as part of the “Fullstack Artificial Intelligence Workshop” organized by Yazılım Academy on August 3-4, 2024. The project covers backend development using Node.js and Hono, frontend design with React 18.3, and the use of artificial intelligence models on the local machine with Ollama. This application, which allows users to interact with artificial intelligence on text and PDF files, offers an integrated solution with modern technologies.
content1: My Mission: To benefit the development of the people around me by improving myself first.
personalInfo: I am Ahmet Yuşa Telli. My mission in life is to first improve myself and be useful to the people around me and my country, then to transfer the information I have learned to those who demand it and to contribute to the development of good people.
educationDetails: As a technology enthusiast and researcher, I graduated from Gebze Technical University Computer Engineering Department. I am currently a master's student at the International University Applied Science in Germany in the field of Artificial Intelligence, the technology of the future.
businessLife: In my business life, I had the opportunity to meet and work with people from different cultures in various projects. I try to pursue such opportunities as much as I can. Each person is a different universe and I think I can learn something from each person.
hobbies: In my daily life, I love doing sports, writing code, editing videos, and flying drones. I do sports 3-4 days a week and kickboxing once a day. A healthy mind lives in a healthy body :) I have a goal of shooting videos of the places I visit, editing them, and sharing them. I have started sharing the places I have visited so far. You can find them on my YouTube channel. I love flying drones, it gives a very different perspective to photography.
contact_content1: Feel free to reach out to me for any inquiries or opportunities.
